programme.title: NCIS: Criminología Naval
programme.desc: Cuando un capitán de la Armada es asesinado en su habitación de hotel, el equipo de NCIS debe localizar y proteger a su compañera embarazada de agresores desconocidos. Mientras tanto, Jimmy trae a su futuro suegro al trabajo.

programme.title: NCIS: Criminología Naval
programme.desc: La investigación por el asesinato de un comandante de la Armada lleva al equipo de NCIS hasta la ubicación de E.J. Barrett.

programme.title: NCIS: Criminología Naval
programme.desc: El equipo de NCIS investiga el asesinato de un teniente comandante de la Armada mientras lidia con el esposo devastado. Mientras tanto, Ziva reevalúa su futuro cuando regresa Ray.

programme.title: Blue Bloods (en español): Pérdida irreparable
programme.desc: Cuando el hijo de Frank, el crítico más abierto de la comunidad afroamericana, el Reverendo Darnell Potter (Ato Essandoh), es asesinado, Potter debe dejar de lado su relación controvertida con la familia Reagan para obtener justicia para su hijo.

programme.title: Blue Bloods (en español): Genética
programme.desc: Cuando Eddie y Jamie se involucran demasiado en un complicado caso de adopción entre los padres biológicos y los padres adoptivos, piden a Erin que los ayude a resolver el conflicto sin ir a la corte.

programme.title: Blue Bloods (en español): Aún persiste
programme.desc: Cuando Danny acepta un trabajo extra como guardaespaldas para un ex convicto recién liberado que asumió la culpa por otra persona, aprovecha la oportunidad para ir tras el verdadero criminal.

programme.title: Blue Bloods (en español): Quien se aleja
programme.desc: Cuando la inmunidad diplomática complica un caso de abuso infantil para Danny y Baez, Frank interviene, a pesar de no tener jurisdicción en el caso.

programme.title: Mentes criminales
programme.desc: El equipo viaja a Atlanta para investigar el asesinato de una mujer, descubriendo que el criminal no trabaja solo.

programme.title: Mentes criminales
programme.desc: Varias parejas que están en proceso de adoptar niños en Seattle empiezan a ser asesinadas. La UAC busca a un criminal que tiene un perfil muy pronunciado de instinto maternal, aunque asesino. Por otro lado, García tiene miedo de hablar con Kevin.

programme.title: Mentes criminales
programme.desc: Un niño llamado Ángel aparece en medio del desierto con profundas cargas psicológicas al haber sido capturado por un psicópata. El niño no puede articular palabras, pero él es el único que puede dar una pista para salvar a otro niño desaparecido.

programme.title: Mentes criminales
programme.desc: Cuando una mujer en Oregon es encontrada muerta en un asilo, la UAC se da cuenta que la víctima es parte de una serie de asesinatos rituales góticos y que el asesino podría ser satanista.

programme.title: NCIS: Criminología Naval
programme.desc: Gibbs se enfrenta a un arma durante una parada rutinaria para tomar café, lo que lo obliga a cuestionar decisiones pasadas y presentes.

programme.title: NCIS: Criminología Naval

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A suspect resisting arrest tells Officers he has a gun in his waist pack. Deputies chase a man on a bike into a backyard. A man tosses car keys on the roof to keep his girlfriend from leaving.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A suspect wanted for brandishing a knife squares up with Officers. A passenger learns the hard way that a friend offered him a ride in a stolen Jeep. A young driver is caught with magic mushrooms.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A driver believes Officers 'cheated' by using Stop Sticks to end a pursuit. A man making threats at a gas station is caught with his pants down. A suspect caught with meth claims he is a video judge.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Officers arrest a man suspected of robbery. A riot erupts at a juvenile party on the beach. Officers find an intoxicated man stuck on an iron fence.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A woman claims a man abused her then put a curse on her. Police arrest a man for having illegal drugs on him. An elderly woman locks herself in the restroom at a bank.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Two cousins fight over a five dollar debt. Police arrest a man for domestic violence. A taxi cab driver is robbed and shot.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Police arrest a suspect for armed robbery. A six foot alligator is found on a homeowner's back porch. An Officer assists in an undercover sting.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Two suspects hit a car with their U-Haul truck. A suspect flees on foot after a car pursuit. An elderly man is selling fake jewelry.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Undercover Officers organize a buy-bust sting. Racoons hide out in a woman's chimney. A man gets pulled over for soliciting a prostitute.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Undercover Vice Officers pose as drug dealers in an illegal drug transaction. A man is pulled over and arrested for driving a stolen vehicle. Three men are caught robbing a coin machine.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: An Officer goes undercover as a prostitute. A woman finds a snake in her home. A man solicits himself to an undercover officer.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Officers go undercover as dealers on a street corner for a drug-reversal sting operation. A man's property is destroyed by his girlfriend's ill-tempered father. An officer spots an intoxicated man assaulting a woman.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Officers engage in a foot pursuit after the passenger of a suspicious vehicle starts running. A man barricades himself in the house after stabbing his nephew. A teenager is caught ditching school to smoke marijuana.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A man is captured after appearing on an episode of "America's Most Wanted". An Officer detains a man for drug possession. Officers serve a search warrant and find four suspects with narcotics in their home.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Two suspects lead Officers on a high speed pursuit. An Officer discovers two men have warrants after a traffic stop. A man hides from the police after a domesitc disturbance call.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: An Officer attempts to pull over a car which leads to a high speed pursuit. An Officer encounters an apartment fire. A man is hit by a vehicle in a trailer park.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Two suspects wreck their vehicle while attempting to evade police in a hot pursuit. Officers respond to a domestic dispute involving neighbors. A suspect abandons his truck and shoes while running from Officers.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A suspect has a change of heart after he leads police on a pursuit. An Officer discovers sterile syringes and rocks in a suspicious man's pocket after he is stopped and searched. A woman is arrested for stealing C.D's out of a car.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A man leads Officers on a pursuit across county lines. An Officer assists in an undercover sting to capture drug dealers. An Officer finds a gun in a suspects car.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A reckless driver claims he wants to kill himself. A woman steals $1,700 from a man trying to buy drugs. Police arrest a man for drinking a driving.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: The suspect of a carjacking tells an Officer that he would rather go to jail than face the wrath of his mother. An Officer investigates a domestic call involving a husband, wife and a lamp. A slow speed pursuit ensues.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A man crashes his vehicle after losing control while attempting to evade the police. An eldery woman with an outstanding DUI warrant is arrested for hit and run. Officers discover methamphetamine while investigating two suspicious vehicles.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A dangerous pursuit between Officers and a known meth dealer ends in an arrest. A suspect with several felony warrants is apprehended without incident. A pursuit involving a stolen motorcycle exceeds speeds of 100mph.

programme.title: COPS

programme.title: COPS

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Officers pursue a male suspect in a speeding truck and ultimately force the vehicle off the road, the suspect is taken into custody without injury. Officers respond to a domestic abuse call. Officers are called to a home where a dead body is found.

programme.title: COPS

programme.desc: While investigating the murder of a convicted ex-cop, the CSIs stumble upon a list in his prison cell with names of several individuals he believed might have been his wife's true killer.

programme.desc: Multiple shootings and stabbings on a public tram leave the CSI team with one witness and a lot of questions.

programme.desc: When the CSI team arrives at a car crash, they find three casualties and a human brain that doesn't belong to any of the victims.

programme.desc: Jason Lee interpreta a un ejecutivo en la ciudad de Seattle que se va a casar con la hija de su jefe (Selma Blair). Su vida se convierte en una pesadilla cuando no se acuerda si la engañó durante su despedida de soltero.

programme.title: La dulce vida
programme.desc: Poppy es una maestra de escuela del norte de Londres, que con su optimismo, supera los pequeños dramas de la vida y contagia de alegría a quienes la rodean.

programme.title: Fragmentos de Abril
programme.desc: April Burns es una hija rebelde que se ha ofrecido a realizar una cena de Acción de Gracias para los más desfavorecidos en su apartamento de East Side. Pero sus intentos de crear una fiesta inolvidable fracasan cuando descubre que su horno no funciona.

programme.title: Emma
programme.desc: Emma es una traviesa joven hermosa que le arregla citas a sus amigas solteras, y arma desastres en sus vidas, hasta que ella misma se enamora. Gwyneth Paltrow protagoniza esta querida adaptación de la novela de Jane Austen.

programme.title: Como si fuera cierto
programme.desc: David Abbott, un arquitecto solitario, encuentra un increíble apartamento en San Francisco, solo para descubrir que está embrujado por el espíritu del inquilino anterior, Elizabeth Masterson, una doctora superdotada que está en coma.

programme.title: Ella está encantada
programme.desc: Anne Hathaway, ganadora de un Oscar, protagoniza un inolvidable cuento de hadas moderno en el que una muchacha recibe el don de la obediencia de su hada madrina. Una asombrosa aventura mágica repleta de coloridos personajes, música, ingenio y fantasía.

programme.title: Treintona, soltera y fantástica
programme.desc: Una mujer en sus treinta y tantos años se descubre a sí misma a través de la vida, el amor y el corazón roto.

programme.title: Los Cuatro Juanes
programme.desc: Los Cuatro famosos Juanes: Juan Colorado, Juan Sin Miedo, Juan Pistolas y Juan Charrasqueado pasan peligrosas aventuras para llevar un importante cargamento de armas y municiones desde Veracruz hasta un pueblo sitiado por las fuerzas del gobierno.

programme.title: Alazán y enamorado
programme.desc: Un ranchero con temple debe lidiar con que su caballo se ha enamorado de Lady Godiva, la yegua de su vecina, una mujer fuerte y decidida. Mientras buscan una solución para el romance de sus caballos, entre ellos también surgirá el amor.

programme.title: Juan Colorado
programme.desc: El norteño Juan, se enamora de la machorra Silvia, pero, su padre la quiere casar con un tal Rafael, el cual por celos y envidia, se une al padre de Silvia, para acabar con Juan. Ella al darse cuenta de lo que sucede, se viste como Juan para salvarlo.

programme.title: Terremoto en Guatemala
programme.desc: Tras el devastador terremoto de 1976 en Guatemala (7.6 Richter), se destaca la historia de amor y sacrificio de una pareja recién casada, víctimas del desastre. Un relato conmovedor sobre la fuerza del compromiso en medio de la tragedia.

programme.title: El álamo
programme.desc: John Wayne y Richard Widmark protagonizan esta espectacular película histórica sobre el ataque de las tropas mexicanas en el in Álamo.

programme.title: El camino del oeste
programme.desc: Kirk Douglas, Robert Mitchum y Richard Widmark protagonizan esta suntuosa historia de los hombres y mujeres que dejaron la comodidad y seguridad de sus vidas por la promesa de una tierra libre y una vida mejor en el indómito Oeste.

programme.title: El regreso de los siete magnificos
programme.desc: Protagonizada por Yul Brynner y con un reparto estelar que incluye a Robert Fuller, Warren Oates y Claude Akins, este western de aventuras sigue a los siete magníficos hasta México, donde se enfrentarán al duelo de sus vidas.

programme.title: Jugadores
programme.desc: Los ganadores del Óscar, Matt Damon y Edward Norton, protagonizan Rounders. Un exadicto a las apuestas regresa a las mesas en una apuesta de vida o muerte para rescatar a su amigo.

programme.title: Abandono
programme.desc: Del escritor ganador del Oscar por la película “Tráfico” llega esta fascinante novela de suspenso con ingeniosos giros argumentales. Katie Holmes interpreta a la alumna guiada por el éxito atormentada por la misteriosa desaparición de un exnovio.

programme.title: Al calor de las armas
programme.desc: Dos criminales secuestran a la mujer equivocada.

programme.title: El escritor fantasma
programme.desc: El cineasta Roman Polanski eleva la tensión en este thriller sobre un escritor (Ewan McGregor) encargado de redactar las vivencias de un ex primer ministro (Pierce Brosnan).

programme.title: Bandidos
programme.desc: ¡Prepárate para una comedia de acción de lo más divertida con Bruce Willis, Billy Bob Thornton y Cate Blanchett! Joe (Willis) y Terry (Thornton), dos convictos, arman un plan para robar un banco… hasta que se topan con una ama de casa bastante excéntrica.

programme.title: En lo más profundo
programme.desc: El oficial, Cole, tiene la misión de infiltrarse en el sindicato de Dios, un brutal jefe criminal. Pero a medida que Cole se involucra en el grupo de Dios, la línea que separa su verdadera identidad de su personalidad callejera comienza a desaparecer.

programme.title: Leyendas de vida
programme.desc: La leyenda de Bagger Vance cuenta la historia de Rannulph Junuh. Su encuentro con Bagger Vance, que se convierte en algo más que un entrenador, llegando a ser un verdadero life coach, es clave para recuperar la confianza en sus capacidades.

programme.title: Todo por ganar
programme.desc: Un entrenador de baloncesto universitario se ve obligado a saltarse las normas para conseguir los jugadores que necesita para seguir siendo competitivo.

programme.title: Mente indomable
programme.desc: El exitoso drama ganador del Óscar, que lanzó las carreras de Matt Damon y Ben Affleck, cuenta la historia de un genio de clase obrera obstinado a quien no le va bien en la vida, hasta que conoce a un profesor de psicología cercano (Robin Williams).

programme.title: Arcángel
programme.desc: El profesor Fluke Kelso se encuentra con un misterioso anciano vinculado a Joseph Stalin.

programme.title: Leyendas de vida
programme.desc: La leyenda de Bagger Vance cuenta la historia de Rannulph Junuh. Su encuentro con Bagger Vance, que se convierte en algo más que un entrenador, llegando a ser un verdadero life coach, es clave para recuperar la confianza en sus capacidades.

programme.title: Evelyn (ESP)
programme.desc: Son tiempos difíciles en Dublín, Irlanda. Pero nadie lo tiene más difícil que Desmond Doyle cuando su esposa se marcha y el gobierno decide mandar a su amada hija Evelyn y sus otros dos hijos jóvenes a un orfanato.

programme.title: La más grande historia jamás contada
programme.desc: La vida de Jesús en la Palestina ocupada por Roma: su nacimiento en Belén, su infancia en Nazaret, la última cena, la traición de su discípulo Judas, su juicio, crucifixión y posterior resurrección.

programme.title: Atrapen al gringo
programme.desc: Un criminal de carrera, capturado por las autoridades mexicanas, es enviado a una prisión de alta seguridad donde aprende a sobrevivir con la ayuda de un niño

programme.title: Peligro inminente
programme.desc: Cuando su mentor, el almirante James Greer, se enferma, Ryan es nombrado director en funciones de la CIA.

programme.title: Terminator: El exterminador
programme.desc: Linda Hamilton and Michael Biehn fight to ensure the future of all mankind -- and an unborn child -- against an unstoppable killing machine -- a terminator (Arnold Schwarzenegger) -- in the modern classic that redefined the sci-fi genre.

programme.title: Lluvia de fuego
programme.desc: Cuando una explosión sacude a Boston, el experto en escuadrones de bombas Jimmy Dove (Jeff Bridges) se ve inmerso en el trabajo más desgarrador de su carrera.

programme.title: Hostage
programme.desc: Un negociador de la policía fracasado que se convierte en un oficial de una pequeña ciudad debe salvar a una familia secuestrada, lo que lo conduce a una situación muy peligrosa.

programme.title: The Cold Light of Day
programme.desc: Bruce Willis, Sigourney Weaver and Henry Cavill star in this pulse-pounding thriller about a man trying to save his kidnapped family.

programme.title: El monje
programme.desc: Chow Yun Fat y Seann William Scott protagonizan esta gran aventura, en la que un misterioso monje tibetano, quien ha protejido un pergamino por 60 años; cree que ha encontrado a su sucesor: un joven callejero.

programme.title: La guerra de los mundos
programme.desc: Una narrativa contemporánea del clásico H.G.Wells, esta historia de suspenso y ciencia ficción revela la extraordinaria lucha por el futuro de la humanidad a través de los ojos de una familia americana.

programme.title: El Smoking
programme.desc: Jimmy Tong es un taxista común transformado en chofer, que se tropieza con un traje de superespía de 2 mil millones de dólares, e inadvertidamente se convierte en un elegante agente secreto.

programme.title: El monje
programme.desc: Chow Yun Fat y Seann William Scott protagonizan esta gran aventura, en la que un misterioso monje tibetano, quien ha protejido un pergamino por 60 años; cree que ha encontrado a su sucesor: un joven callejero.

programme.title: Naturaleza desatada: terremoto
programme.desc: La familia de un ingeniero está en el camino directo del peligro después de que un temblor masivo dañe gravemente una planta nuclear rusa.

programme.title: La sublevación de los oceanos
programme.desc: Un científico construye un arca enorme después de que se ignoran sus advertencias de una inundación que destruirá la Tierra. El desastre es inevitable, y los que difamaron al científico suben al arca desesperados, antes de que el mundo se ahogue.

programme.title: La guerra de los mundos
programme.desc: En esta nueva versión moderna del clásico horror de ciencia ficción de H.G. Wells, la civilización se arruina cuando una súper raza de extraterrestre invade la Tierra.

programme.title: El Smoking
programme.desc: Jimmy Tong es un taxista común transformado en chofer, que se tropieza con un traje de superespía de 2 mil millones de dólares, e inadvertidamente se convierte en un elegante agente secreto.

programme.title: El mundo está loco, loco
programme.desc: Un elenco de estrellas de la comedia traerá risas de principio a fin cuando un magnate de los casinos le dé a seis avariciosos competidores la oportunidad de ganar dos millones en una carrera de Las Vegas a Nuevo México.

programme.title: Cocodrilo Dundee
programme.desc: Michael J. "Cocodrilo" Dundee es un australiano de espíritu libre que caza cocodrilos con las manos, les clava la mirada a búfalos de agua y bebe hasta desmadrarse.

programme.title: Los reyes pal palacio
programme.desc: Momentos divertidos al lado de los talentosos Miguel Céspedes y Raymond Pozo, con más de 600 programas de televisión producidos y viendo la sonrisa de la gente de manera directa en los espectáculos que han realizado en vivo.

programme.title: Una guerra de película
programme.desc: Ben Stiller, Jack Black y Robert Downey Jr. encabezan un reparto singular en 'Una Guerra de Película', una comedia de acción sobre un grupo de actores que se disponen a realizar la película de guerra más cara.

programme.title: A Toda Madre: A Toda Madre
programme.desc: Barbra Streisand y Seth Rogen son el dúo cómico perfecto al embarcarse en un gran viaje. Cuando Andy invita a su madre a un viaje de 8 días y 4800 kilómetros por el país, cuanto más lejos viajan, más cercanos se vuelven.

programme.title: Redención
programme.desc: Una estudiante de una escuela bautista es repudiada y considerada demoníaca tras quedar embarazada.

programme.title: Querido Dios
programme.desc: Greg Kinnear protagoniza en este espíritu-levantador sobre un estafador que va de nada bueno al hacer el bien.

programme.title: Cómo cortar a tu patán
programme.desc: Amanda, una terapeuta especializada en ayudar a las mujeres a terminar las relaciones destructivas, vive lejos de los hombres y del compromiso. Dedicada al trabajo y la protección de su hermana Natalia.

programme.title: Casese Quien Pueda
programme.desc: The best-laid love plans go hilariously awry in this romantic-comedy hit about two sisters (Martha and Miriam Higareda) who find themselves in uncharted romantic territory.

programme.title: Bala mordida
programme.desc: Mauro Hernández es un joven policía que bajo las órdenes de su comandante se ve involucrado en un intercambio de droga.

programme.title: Feliz año Tijuana
programme.desc: Un encuentro casual con un ex alumno en Tijuana en la víspera de Año Nuevo conduce a una noche emocionalmente turbulenta para un profesor que se encuentra en una encrucijada en su vida.

programme.title: Divina confusión
programme.desc: Comedia mexicana llena de estrellas donde el amor de hoy en día recibe un empujoncito por parte de poderes de lo más alto.

programme.title: Hazlo como hombre
programme.desc: Mauricio Ochmann y Aislinn Derbez protagonizan esta divertidísima comedia sobre un hombre cuyo mundo se pone patas arriba cuando su mejor amigo - y futuro cuñado - le anuncia que es gay.

programme.title: Me late chocolate
programme.desc: Después de que su prometido muere inesperadamente, una mujer decide aceptar la vida y seguir su sueño de trabajar con chocolate.

programme.title: Canela (LAS)
programme.desc: Restaurant owner Tere has fallen into a state of depression after the tragic death of her daughter. With her eatery facing crisis, granddaughter Maria steps in to help Tere rediscover her love of good food and save the business from disarray.

programme.title: Una Niñera Para Navidad
programme.desc: Una mujer de carrera cuida a los hijos de un ejecutivo de publicidad de Beverly Hills durante las vacaciones navideñas.

programme.title: Una Propuesta Navideña
programme.desc: Una abogada se enfrenta a su antiguo novio para defender su pequeña ciudad de la demolición.

programme.title: Intercambio navideño
programme.desc: Las gemelas Maya y Ana, separadas al nacer y con vidas totalmente distintas, se descubren e intercambian vidas por una noche, alterando sus destinos para siempre.

programme.title: La mejor Navidad
programme.desc: Gloria, enfocada en su trabajo en Miami después de su divorcio, envía a sus hijos a pasar la Navidad con su exmarido en Jalisco. Lo que no imaginan es que esta decisión les va a cambiar la vida.

programme.title: Blizzard: Un reno muy especial
programme.desc: Una historia encantadora de Katie y su amistad mágica con Blizzard, uno de los renos más nuevos de Santa. Blizzard usa sus poderes especiales para ayudar a Katie a darse cuenta de su potencial y fuerza interior.

programme.title: Aventuras en juguetilandia
programme.desc: Juguetilandia está en peligro por el malvado Barnaby (Richard Mulligan) y solo puede salvarla Lisa (Drew Barrymore), una niña que no cree en los juguetes. También protagonizada por Eileen Brennan, Keanu Reeves y Pat Morita.

programme.title: La Reina de la Navidad
programme.desc: Ashley siempre ha sido la "Reina de la Navidad" de la ciudad. Es decir, hasta que conoce a su pareja en la ciudad, Ben, un chico nuevo y atractivo que ama la Navidad tanto como ella. Unen fuerzas para hacer que la Navidad sea aún más significativa.

programme.title: Blizzard: Un reno muy especial
programme.desc: Una historia encantadora de Katie y su amistad mágica con Blizzard, uno de los renos más nuevos de Santa. Blizzard usa sus poderes especiales para ayudar a Katie a darse cuenta de su potencial y fuerza interior.

programme.title: El hijo de Dios
programme.desc: La historia de la vida de Jesús se cuenta desde su humilde nacimiento a través de sus enseñanzas, crucifixión y resurrección final.

programme.title: La maldición
programme.desc: En este thriller apasionante y sobrenatural con las estrellas más populares de Hollywood, un temor del estudio crece hasta convertirse en una vertiginosa pesadilla para un profesor y tres sujetos atrapados en una mansión misteriosa.

programme.title: Cementerio de mascotas
programme.desc: Para la mayoría de las familias, una mudanza es un nuevo comienzo. Pero para los Creeds será el inicio del fin. Se han mudado al lado del lugar que los niños construyen con sus sueños rotos, el Cementerio de mascotas.

programme.title: Final Girl
programme.desc: Veronica está entrenando para ser una asesina y un grupo de chicos que la llevan al bosque con intenciones de asesinarla a ella, se encuentran con esta sorpresa. Serán ellos su presa.

programme.title: El Perfume: Historia de un asesino
programme.desc: En Francia, en el siglo 18, vivió Jean-Baptiste Grenouille, que nació con un gran sentido del olfato. Pero cuando su don se transforma en obsesión, lucha por crear el perfume más excitante del mundo matando jovencitas para capturar su esencia.

programme.title: Hellraiser: La puerta del infierno
programme.desc: Pinhead regresa en el siguiente escalofriante capítulo del electrizante legado de “Hellraiser”, creado por el escritor de terror más vendido (y director de cine original) Clive Barker.

programme.title: Viernes 13
programme.desc: El campamento Lago Crystal ha estado cerrado durante más de 20 años debido a varios feroces asesinatos sin resolver.

programme.title: Viernes 13: parte 2
programme.desc: Cinco años después del baño de sangre en Camp Crystal, todo lo que queda es la leyenda de Jason y su madre demente, que había asesinado a siete consejeros del campamento.

programme.title: Gunsight Ridge
programme.desc: Stage line agent investigates a series of robberies by taking the job of a deputy sheriff in a border Arizona town.

programme.title: The Iron Sheriff
programme.desc: Sterling Hayden plays a sheriff with continuing moral dilemmas. Should he relate a deathbed confession which falsely implicates his son in a murder? Should he carry out his threat to cold-bloodedly kill the real murderer or bring him to legal justice?

programme.title: God Forgives, I Don't
programme.desc: A fast-shooting gunman and an insurance agent track down the murdering robbers of a train hijacking and the stolen money.

programme.title: Bells Of Capistrano
programme.desc: A feud between rodeo companies accelerates when both want Gene Autry, as a crowd-drawing added attraction. This film features Gene singing five hits, including "In Old Capistrano" and "Forgive Me."

programme.title: Call Of The Canyon
programme.desc: Gene Autry leads cattlemen in rebellion when a packing company rep cheats them. A gal’s future depends on the company's radio spots for her show! It gets exciting when the owner appears incognito.

programme.title: Guns Of The Magnificent Seven
programme.desc: In this thrilling follow-up to one of the greatest Western sagas in film history, notorious desperado Chris Adams (George Kennedy) is offered a huge reward to free a young Mexican revolutionary from prison…in the midst of the Mexican Revolution.

programme.title: A Fistful Of Dynamite
programme.desc: The results are explosive when an Irish terrorist (James Coburn) with a dynamite obsession teams up with a Mexican peasant-turned- revolutionary (Rod Steiger) in this action-packed tale of power and politics. Directed by the legendary Sergio Leone.

programme.title: Charade
programme.desc: Romance and suspense ensue in Paris as a woman is pursued by several men who want a fortune her murdered husband had stolen. Whom can she trust?

programme.title: That Touch of Mink
programme.desc: Love arrives with a splash when a handsome and eligible tycoon and a beautiful working woman meet over a curbside mud puddle. He’s enchanted by her small town ways, she’s captivated by his romantic, debonair manner.

programme.title: Houseboat
programme.desc: This Oscar®-nominated film has the legendary Cary Grant as a government attorney who can't seem to shake his bad fortune. Living on a houseboat, widowed and left with three unruly kids, he hires Sophia Loren as a governess.

programme.title: The Jackie Robinson Story
programme.desc: The legendary Jackie Robinson stars as himself in this inspiring biopic that traces his remarkable ascent from poverty to becoming the first black American to play major league baseball.

programme.title: The Misfits
programme.desc: In their final screen performances, Clark Gable and Marilyn Monroe are at their luminous best as an aging cowboy and a disillusioned divorcee, each trying to adapt to new ways of life in John Huston's piercing classic. Montgomery Clift also stars.

programme.title: Hobson's Choice
programme.desc: Widower Henry Hobson is a successful bootmaker and a tyrannical father of three daughters who all want to leave him by getting married, but he refuses because marriage traditions require him to pay out settlements.

programme.title: Blithe Spirit
programme.desc: A man and his second wife are haunted by the ghost of his first wife.

programme.title: The Honeymooners: Lost Episodes
programme.desc: Ralph takes a job as a sidewalk Santa to earn extra money, only it turns out to be a front for illegal bookmakers.

programme.title: The Honeymooners: The Christmas Special
programme.desc: As Christmas approaches, Ralph Kramden's latest get-rich scheme risks his and Alice's life savings -- and trusting pal Ed Norton's holiday bonus -- on the lottery. The gamble also places Alice's mother's Social Security check in jeopardy.

programme.title: The Honeymooners Specials: A Christmas Carol
programme.desc: The Honeymooners return for their final series of long-lost specials – in color!

programme.title: The Donna Reed Show
programme.desc: Donna is fed up with how nowadays no one has the true Christmas spirit anymore. Her faith in mankind is restored when she discovers just who has been secretly giving the Christmas parties for the children's ward all these years.

programme.title: The Many Loves Of Dobie Gillis
programme.desc: Herbert T. Gillis finds himself in jail on Christmas Eve after being stripped of his holiday spirit and driven to desperation by his family and customers.

programme.title: The Many Loves Of Dobie Gillis
programme.desc: Maynard decides to throw a Christmas party in his garage but most of the other kids, Dobie included, have accepted invitations to a swank party thrown by Chatsworth.

programme.title: The Many Loves Of Dobie Gillis
programme.desc: Appointed class treasurer, soft-hearted Maynard ends up giving the money raised for the Christmas dance to a poor Hispanic family.

programme.title: The Many Loves Of Dobie Gillis
programme.desc: When Maynard announces that he still believes in Santa Claus, the Gilleses decide to cure him of his fantasy.

programme.title: The Odd Couple
programme.desc: After turning down the role of Scrooge in a Felix directed Christmas play, Oscar kicks Felix out of the apartment.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.desc: Homer Bedloe tries to gain possession of the Cannonball on Christmas Eve.

programme.title: Green Acres
programme.desc: Oliver is absolutely determined to have a truly old-fashioned Christmas, including decorating his own farm-grown tree. But warm weather stands in the way and, he discovers, the residents of Hooterville aren't exactly as traditional as he thought.

programme.title: Family Affair
programme.desc: Buffy makes friends with another girl in the apartment building and finds out the girl is very sick and may not live too much longer. Buffy asks Uncle Bill if they can have a Christmas holiday because Eve might not be alive in December.

programme.title: Too Close For Comfort
programme.desc: The Rushes are forced to cancel their plans to spend Christmas at Mammoth Mountain when Andrew comes down with a fever. Henry's day gets even worse when he allows Monroe to help him decorate the tree.

programme.title: The Brady Bunch
programme.desc: Carol gets laryngitis right before singing at the Christmas service.

programme.title: A Very Brady Christmas
programme.desc: The entire Brady family manages to overcome personal obstacles to spend a happy holiday together.

programme.title: The Doris Day Show
programme.desc: Doris invites Ron and Myrna to spend Christmas on the ranch with her and the boys.

programme.title: The Doris Day Show
programme.desc: Mr. Jarvis disrupts Doris' Christmas Party when he turns into a Scrooge and threatens to shut it down.

programme.title: The Doris Day Show
programme.desc: Doris plays Santa to clear another St. Nick who is charged with murder.

programme.title: Taxi
programme.desc: A Christmas party at the garage is interrupted when Louie, the dispatcher teams up with Alex in a game of high-stakes poker against his cardshark brother Nick.

programme.title: That Girl
programme.desc: Ann tells Donald about her stint as a teacher in a boarding school, trying to bring good tidings and joy to a boy who won't be able to go home for Christmas.

programme.title: That Girl
programme.desc: Ann buys theater tickets from a scalper as a Christmas present for the Baumans, but she later learns from Don that some scalpers use personal information to burglarize their customers.

programme.title: All in the Family
programme.desc: It's Christmas Day and Archie is the only one not in the Christmas spirit. Mike and Gloria question him, but he refuses to reveal what's bugging him. The Jeffersons come over to wish the Bunkers a 'Merry Christmas'.

programme.title: In the Heat of the Night
programme.desc: After his nephew Matt almost dies from a drug overdose, Bubba Skinner travels to Atlanta, Georgia to help him overcome his addiction to heroin. While investigating Matt’s drug supplier, he teams up with an undercover detective, Walker Harris.

programme.title: In the Heat of the Night
programme.desc: While hitchhiking his way to Sparta to visit Chief Gillespie, a Vietnamese teenager, Hank, witnesses a store robbery that turns into a murder. Hank was hoping that Gillespie would help him acquire citizenship, but now he's being framed for murder.

programme.title: In the Heat of the Night
programme.desc: It’s Christmastime and an eager journalist from the local Sparta Herald newspaper begs to interview the police force; however, when she twists their stories to fit her negative agenda, the officers learn a hard lesson about the power of the press.

programme.title: In the Heat of the Night
programme.desc: Sergeant LuAnn Corbin takes temporary custody of an abandoned baby boy found at a crack house after a drive-by shooting is reported in the Bottoms. When the infant’s young mother, a crack addict, comes to reclaim the boy, LuAnn struggles to let go.

programme.title: In the Heat of the Night
programme.desc: Tragedy strikes Sparta when a young alcoholic woman, Holly Maynard, kills a child, Denia Larson, in a hit-and-run accident; however, a second and unexpected tragedy sadly follows, which will expose certain tragic failures of the justice system.

programme.title: In the Heat of the Night
programme.desc: Marissa and David, interracial sweethearts at Sparta High School, are targeted by a racist sniper who takes a shot at Marissa. Many people in town assume that David was the real target, because he’s Black, but then why was only one shot taken?

programme.title: In the Heat of the Night
programme.desc: Parker Williams is shocked to find his ex-fiancée, Beverly Ross, at a drug deal, but he’s even more shocked when Beverly accuses him of using excessive force during the arrest. He claims it was self-defense, but Beverly is sticking to her story.

programme.title: In the Heat of the Night
programme.desc: Former madam, Maybelle Cheseboro, has returned to Sparta, but this time with a legitimate phone sex business, instead of a brothel. Meanwhile, a city official, Drew Ward, is linked to the death of Jessica Lund, one of Maybelle’s phone workers.

programme.title: In the Heat of the Night
programme.desc: While hitchhiking his way to Sparta to visit Chief Gillespie, a Vietnamese teenager, Hank, witnesses a store robbery that turns into a murder. Hank was hoping that Gillespie would help him acquire citizenship, but now he's being framed for murder.

programme.title: In the Heat of the Night

programme.desc: En las primeras horas de la mañana, justo antes de Navidad, una estudiante universitaria fue secuestrada del estacionamiento de su departamento. Su cuerpo fue encontrado más tarde ese día. Ella había sido agredida sexualmente y fue disparada a quemarropa.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: En 1993, Kathryn Bishop de 82 años es encontrada muerta en su hogar de Pennsylvania. Pequeñas pistas en el cuerpo de la víctima le dirán a la policía lo que pasó esa noche.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: En 1981, Cassie Hansen, de 6 años, desapareció de su iglesia de Minnesota durante una misa vespertina. Después de recibir un aviso de que se vio a un hombre mayor cargando a una persona pequeña, la policía encontró el cuerpo de Cassie en un basurero.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: Un cazador de Colorado que había recibido tres disparos fue víctima de un crimen bien planeado. Los investigadores sospecharon dos armas y dos asesinos.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: Un millonario y su familia fueron ejecutados en su propio hogar. Durante tres años, los crímenes quedaron sin resolverse. Finalmente, una caja de 30 años de municiones y unas fibras fluorescentes revelan la traición final.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: En el 2001, Ginger Hayes y su pequeño hijo fueron secuestrados durante un robo de auto. El crimen había sido reportado por un testigo a los pocos minutos de ocurrir.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: Fue uno de los crímenes más descarados del siglo 20. Adolph Coors III, el ejecutivo de Coors Brewing Company, fue secuestrado y retenido para un rescate.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos: Rompiendo el Molde
programme.desc: El hijo de tres años de unos padres de Dripping Springs, Texas, desarrolla una condición respiratoria.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos: Plato frío
programme.desc: Un hombre murió en su casa después de una larga historia de enfermedad cardíaca. Se asumió que esta fue la causa de su muerte.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: En 1996, una agencia federal dictaminó que Terri Strickland había provocado intencionalmente el fuego que mató a su hijo de 17 meses, Josh Hinson.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos: Pareja perfecta
programme.desc: Una examinación de la primera vez que se utilizó ADN animal para resolver un caso penal

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: Susie Mowbray fue acusada de la muerte de su esposo. Su hijo estaba tan convencido de su inocencia que se matriculó en la facultad de derecho, estudió todas las pruebas y, finalmente, descubrió la verdad de lo que realmente sucedió entre sus padres.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: En 1971, John List dejó una nota con los cuerpos de su madre, esposa y tres hijos en el salón de baile de su mansión antes de desaparecer por completo. Los detectives deben resolver el caso, a pesar de tener solo una fotografía desactualizada de List.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: Cuando el secretario de la corte, Peter Porco, no se presenta a trabajar en noviembre de 2004, se ordena a un oficial de la corte que se dirija a la casa familiar de los Porcos en Bethlehem, Nueva York.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: El 15 de Octubre de 1985, dos explosiones de bombas sacudieron a Salt Lake City y resultaron en dos muertes. Una tercera explosión ocurrió al día siguiente; esta vez, la víctima sobrevivió.

programme.desc: From Utilita Arena Sheffield in England.

programme.title: Boxing
programme.desc: Floyd Mayweather Jr. returned to welterweight to go up against Britain's Ricky Hatton.

programme.title: Boxing

programme.title: Boxing
programme.desc: At the peak of his powers Amir Khan collided with Lamont Peterson in a junior-welterweight unification fight.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: As the girls get the DCC look, it helps some and not others. Two surprise guests stop by rehearsal and rock the DCC's world. Kelli has one of the most awkward office visits of all time.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: Cameos and Show Group auditions push the new girls and vets to their limits. Melissa Rycroft tries to save a DCC that's hanging by a thread and there is a shocking outcome from a Kelli office visit.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: Emotions are supercharged as Kelli & Judy make a lot of tough cuts to keep up the quality of the team. Melissa Rycroft offers invaluable field experience.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: Kelli finally announces the squad. Injuries threaten the opening of Cowboys training camp. Game Day chaos endangers a flawless performance.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: Hundreds of beautiful and talented hopefuls arrive to try out for the best cheerleading team in the world, while many of the returning girls are looking for redemption. New judges increase the pressure of moving on to Finals.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: Veterans fight for their jobs as new girls try to live their dreams and make DCC Training Camp. Standing in their way is; panel Interviews, solos, an exhausting dance combination and a room full of very tough judges.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: The new candidates' eyes are opened as they get a taste of what it is to be a DCC. As girls struggle to learn the dances, the reality of being "Big Time", sets in. Melissa Rycroft meets the new girls for the first time.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: With the first cut looming, the girls must push their dance skills to the limit. Melissa Rycroft works to bring out showmanship. Extra stress is added on Makeover day as the girls try to get the DCC look.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: A new choreographer shakes things up. The girls better start looking good because uniform fittings and the Belk fashion show are on the agenda. Surprises continue when two-time Grammy winner Kacey Musgraves, stops by rehearsal.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: Melissa Rycroft makes a house call to help Yuko. Kitty Carter rocks a few of the candidate's worlds. Cameos give Kelli & Judy a fresh perspective on the girls. At Show Group auditions, the girls let it all hang out.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: Kellie Pickler comes to a rehearsal to share her experience and motivate the girls as Training Camp is coming to an end. Melissa Rycroft makes Kelsey aware of a big mistake. Candace Romo helps with a big night of cuts.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: Squad announcement is bittersweet as some favorites go home. The team has their first appearance at the Star Ribbon cutting. Game Day is when dreams come true!

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: Hundreds of beautiful and talented women converge on AT&T Stadium to start the hardest audition process in professional sports, trying out for a coveted spot on the most famous NFL cheerleading squad in the world, the Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: With the field narrowed down to 119 women, the pressure is on. They must quickly learn a power pom routine and the famous kickline in order to perform it an hour later before the judges.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: The veterans finally enter the audition process. Now all 83 women are judged head to head during a panel interview, a solo dance performance and on their appearance on the football field as seen and the big screen.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: 44 women begin the very first training camp at the new 1 billion dollar Cowboys' facility, The Star. At the First Meeting, Kelli lays down the law and makes it clear that eight women will be sent home this summer.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: First, the ladies need to have the "classic look" of a Dallas Cowboys Cheerleader. Kelli's hair and make-up transformations are legendary. The ladies are also assessed through a new state of the art fitness test, "Styku".

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: The residents of a glamorous resort town are shocked when a well-known woman from a prominent family is found dead in her home.

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: A bombshell more than a decade after the crime reignites the investigation into the death of Sarah Pagel's mother, who was killed when Sarah was seven.

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: Investigators from Fort Worth, Texas, desperately search for answers after 17-year-old Carla Walker is kidnapped and murdered following a Valentine's Day dance; cutting-edge DNA technology and diligent police work lead detectives to her killer.

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: The security cameras at the home of a wife and mother of three's home may hold the key to solving the mystery of her disappearance.

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: A teenager disappears from her friend's house before being found dead.

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: After teenagers Rachel Shoaf and Sheila Eddy are convicted of murdering their 16-year-old friend, Skylar Neese, Skylar's parents discuss the night she disappeared; Rachel Shoaf's therapist, Patricia Bailey, shares her thoughts.

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: A beloved former firefighter is found dead in his garage; a neighbor's home security camera may provide answers.

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: A man from Iowa is shot to death while sleeping in bed next to his fiancee; coincidences and quick thinking lead to surprising information regarding the killer's motive.

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: When two women call 911 after hearing someone break into their apartment, their call for help holds the key to solving the mysterious murder of a young graduate student named Katie Sepich.

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: A 40-year-old Minnesota woman is shot to death in her bed while her husband and teenage daughter are home, leaving investigators to wonder who would want her dead.

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: A couple's anniversary celebration ends in murder during what appears to have been a home invasion, but investigators believe the suspect might be connected to the victim.

programme.title: I Love New York: Blood Oath Gone Bad
programme.desc: After snitching, fighting, and spitting, and nearly getting eliminated, one man is the house enemy and anxiously waits for an opportunity to redeem himself.

programme.title: I Love New York: Nip/Suck
programme.desc: New York surprises the guys with the return of one man. Another man is unhappy as his world is suddenly turned upside down and he literally fears for his life.

programme.title: I Love New York: I Still Have Love for New York
programme.desc: New York invites the remaining six guys' exes to the house and this time, there's a special twist involved. She's bringing two of HER exes, Chance and Real, to help dig up some dirt on her guys.

programme.title: I Love New York: Mind Games
programme.desc: With 5 guys left, New York wants to find out who's the most compatible with her and who's just plain crazy, when she takes the boys for a psych test.

programme.title: I Love New York: Meet the Parents
programme.desc: With only four guys left it's time to clean house, literally. New York has invited some special guests-the guy's parents, so she gets her boys to scour and scrub her house for their arrival.

programme.title: I Love New York: Miami Thrice
programme.desc: After the last elimination, New York tells her final three men to pack their bags because they're heading to Miami!

programme.title: I Love New York: Clip Show
programme.desc: In this 30-minute special episode, NY hosts a look back at hilarious, never-before-seen moments with our favorite guys from the series.

programme.title: I Love New York: Rasta Finale
programme.desc: After a season of ups and downs and a tense elimination in Miami, it's down to New York's final two suitors. They accompany New York to the tropics of Jamaica for the final showdown.

programme.title: Rock of Love: Hustle on the Bustle
programme.desc: Twice unlucky in love, this time Bret Michaels leaves his mansion behind and takes twenty even more beautiful babes on tour with him to find a girlfriend who can handle his life on the road.

programme.title: Rock of Love: Fifteen Weddings And Three Funerals
programme.desc: Fifteen girls take turns reciting their own wedding vows to Bret.

programme.title: Rock of Love: Babes On Ice
programme.desc: Bret is looking for a woman with maternal instincts, so he puts his twelve girls in ice skates to see how well they protect “Baby Bret” against the University of Illinois Women's Hockey Team and special guest player, Lacey.

programme.title: Rock of Love: Roadies
programme.desc: Bret Michaels has a concert tonight. Ten girls compete to see who can clear the band's equipment off the stage the fastest.

programme.title: Rock of Love: Eight Is Not Enough
programme.desc: The eight remaining girls get a distressing “wake-up call” when Bret brings in three new girls to join the tour because he's not feeling the emotional effort.

programme.title: Rock of Love: Mudbowl III
programme.desc: It's Pink Bus vs. Blue Bus in the muddiest of Mudbowls yet! Bret flies away with the MVP for an intimate overnight trip.

programme.title: Deal or No Deal
programme.desc: With 26 sealed briefcases full of varying amounts of cash, ranging from a penny to $1m – contestants decide whether to accept an offer of cash from ‘the Banker,’ in exchange for what might be contained in the contestant’s chosen briefcase.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: The end of another school year finds Darcy’s faith – in her boyfriend – being put to the test. When she discovers that Spinner has a past, Darcy grapples with a harsh reality of teen romance: jealousy.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: When Peter receives a new car for his birthday, he quickly becomes a frequent face in the street racing scene.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Things heat up between Emma and Sean – and when she takes time off from Peter to consider her relationship with Sean, Peter takes action – and Sean winds up expelled from Degrassi.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Emma is happy that the racing debacle is behind them, and that Peter is finally free if you don’t count the house arrest and five hundred hours of community service.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Jimmy starts the year off with big plans, coaching the girl’s junior basketball team and he is determined to take his relationship with Ashley to the next level. But can Jimmy handle the realities of his sexual future?

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Peter, hoping to join the Spirit Squad, links Darcy’s personal web page to his. Darcy is thrilled with all the attention and hits she gets, and even posts some racy pictures of the Spirit Squad.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Darcy’s online admirers take up more and more of her time, and her relationship with Spinner suffers. As Darcy posts increasingly sexy photos of herself, she’s surprised when her favourite online fan decides to introduce himself.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: After Career Aptitude test results come in, Spinner is less than pleased with his results, and in desperation, convinces Jimmy to go into business selling T-shirts adorned with Jimmy’s illustrations.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: After being released from jail, Sean finds himself sleeping on Spike & Snake’s couch. Sean is focusing on putting the last few months behind him, getting a great job and being a fantastic boyfriend to Emma.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Craig’s back in town for a music festival – and Manny can’t help picking up right where they left off.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Ellie thinks all Craig’s bad behaviour is due to Manny – to help him, she’s determined to stay by his side while he’s in town.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Manny’s intent on getting over Craig, and uses Liberty’s upcoming birthday as an excuse to throw a party at Emma’s house while Spike and Snake are out of town.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: In shock after over JT’s death, Toby turns to Liberty, convinced that his somber funeral isn’t what JT would’ve wanted. Liberty agrees, and the two grief-stricken friends plan to throw a celebratory memorial for JT at Degrassi.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Manny’s parents want her to come home after the tragedy at Emma’s house – and to Emma’s surprise, Manny agrees.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: After a spectacular panic attack during a midterm exam, Paige’s professor at Banting offers her one more chance – which comes in the form of a ton of work to be completed over the holiday weekend.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: With her degree in jeopardy thanks to her failing grades, and the little issue of a dramatic dorm fire, Paige develops a Banting allergy. She slinks home to Toronto with her tail between her legs – but nobody can know the truth about what happened.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Paige has one goal: to return to her former pre-Banting glory. She’s going to get back to doing what she does best. Everything – and that includes dating. Paige surprises Spinner by asking him out. Nothing serious, just casual.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Marco’s at loose ends with Dylan gone and nothing seems exciting. He and Spinner decide a spring break road trip will break the monotony – but cash is the key.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Alex and her mother Emily are in trouble - Chad, Emily's boyfriend, has run up thousands of dollars in credit card debt and hasn't been paying the rent.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Alex's double life is finally bringing in the cash she wants but hiding everything from everyone is taking a toll on her schoolwork and her connection with Paige.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: The corridors of Degrassi have become a pressure cooker. With an unexpected influx of students from Lakehurst, Degrassi students find themselves facing old enemies and new friends.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Abstinence-pledged Darcy wakes up in a strange bed, screamingly hung-over. Panic-stricken, she tries to piece together the events of the night before. She knows – physically – she had sex, but everything else is a blank.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Paige is ecstatic to have landed herself a gig in the fashion world. If everything goes well, this could turn itself into a brand new career path.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: After seeing Craig’s newly released album on the shelves at the record store, Ashley decides to pursue her own music – starting with a performance at the Lakehurst-Degrassi talent mixer.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Amidst the crowded classrooms and the battle for school territory, tensions between Lakehurst and Degrassi students continue to mount. But Spinner’s got his eye on enemy territory -- the adorably tough new Lakehurst girl, Jane.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Faced with his own aggression and looming mortality, Spinner attempts to prove his ‘masculinity’ by kicking an unnecessary amount of Lakehurst ass.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Manny’s moved back home but the honeymoon between she and her parents is just about over. And when her dad insists she have a traditional “Debut” – the lavish party many Filipino girls have for their 18th birthday – Manny takes a stand.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Rick decides to get back at his bullies, hitting them right where it hurts – their cars. But when Jimmy becomes a member of the “Whack Your Brain” team, the two form a truce.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter

programme.desc: Accused of murdering his former friend East-O, Sage Odom is poised to lose everything in his empire; his partner and now fiancée Collette Jones is by his side supporting him, but Collette is hiding a deep secret.

programme.title: Step Up
programme.desc: A troubled Rigo must choose between abandoning the lucrative tour or headlining the tour to help rescue the man who possibly murdered his father; with his friend Poppy by his side, he turns the tables on Sage and Collette.

programme.title: Step Up
programme.desc: Prohibited from performing at the BMT Awards, Sage reluctantly agrees to let Rigo perform in his slot; at the live awards performance, Rigo reveals a surprise for everyone that changes the direction of the entire tour.

programme.title: Step Up
programme.desc: Sage's actions during the night of the BMT Awards have landed him back in jail; Marquise's meddling upsets everyone; at the Tabernacle, Rigo thrills the audience, but haters confront him.

programme.title: Step Up
programme.desc: At Sage's evidentiary hearings, the D.A.'s strategy is working and Sage could be tried for murder; meanwhile, things heat up between Marquise and Angel.

programme.title: Step Up
programme.desc: Sage is freed from jail and ready to reclaim the tour as headliner; the Chicago show will be Rigo's final performance and he's under pressure tocome up with new material; Poppy and Collette butt heads over Rigo.

programme.desc: Deep in the heart of Jakarta's slums lies a drug-gang’s safe house, home to some of the most terrifying and ruthless fighters in the city. Arriving before dawn, an elite swat team moves in to take down the notorious drug lord that runs it.

programme.title: The Raid 2 (Subtitled)
programme.desc: Following immediately after the events of THE RAID, Rama (Iko Uwais) is forced to reinvent himself as an undercover cop in order to provide protection for his wife and child.

programme.title: Preman: Silent Fury
programme.desc: After his son witnesses a brutal murder by a notorious crime boss, a deaf Indonesian gangster is thrust into the fight of his life when he takes on his dangerous former allies—including a sociopathic assassin—in order to protect his child.

programme.title: Merantau
programme.desc: Leaving the simple life in rural West Sumatera, Yuda must undergo merantau, the traditional rite of passage in which a young man must leave his family’s home to make it on his own.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When 19-year-old Lori Auker left her Pennsylvania home for work and never arrived, it took space-age technology, cat hairs and insects to pinpoint the woman's abductor.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When Leann Fletcher is found dead, investigators use blood spatter analysis and forensic computing to find a motive for her murder: her husband, a prominent lawyer, was having an affair with judge Susan Chrzanowski.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: By using techniques she saw on forensic science TV shows, a mother determines who was responsible for the accident that permanently injured her 4-year-old daughter.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When a woman and her daughter didn't return home from shopping, her husband directed police to a nearby mall. The child's body was found, but there was no sign of the wife.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When Chris Ochoa confessed to the 1988 rape and murder of Nancy DePriest, the case was closed. 8 years later, Achim Marino confessed to the same crime. Can DNA evidence identify the real perpetrator?

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When two boys are brutally attacked, investigators rely on evidence fished out of a nearby pond. It became the first case where diatom analysis was used to place a suspect at the scene of the crime.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 1988, the body of a young woman was discovered in an Ohio river. Most of the evidence had been washed away, but the victim's 6-year-old son unwittingly told investigators all they needed to know — without saying a word. The clue was in his genes.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 1991, a high school girl vanished after attending a party. The prime suspect had two alibi witnesses for the night she disappeared. A solid alibi can often overcome circumstantial evidence, but forensic evidence is another matter.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When police discovered the body of Douglas Beamish's estranged wife, authorities linked 20 cat hairs found on her jacket to a cat owned by Beamish's parents. It was the first time animal DNA was used to solve a criminal case.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When more than 700 Oregonians contracted food poisoning from a unique strain of salmonella in 1984, investigators uncovered a secret plot to influence local elections.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Two sets of scientists probe a woman's death.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 1995, the founder of American Atheists disappeared with one of her sons, her granddaughter and $500,000 in gold coins. The police investigated several suspects, including David R. Waters, who worked for American Atheists.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Two eyewitnesses may hold the key to the death of a motorcycle gang member.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 1984, a passerby finds the torso of a woman in a cardboard box. A forensic entomologist analyzes nearby insect activity to determine when the victim was killed.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: The investigation into the kidnapping and rape of an 18-year-old Ohio woman is aided when the victim returns hours after the incident occurred. With her help, the police are able to track the assailant to his front door.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: The police investigate when a severed leg is discovered among garbage. Conventional means of identifying the victim are impossible, leading investigators to rely on DNA, forensic anthropology and toxicology.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In a 1992 murder case, the autopsy of a cremated body turns up telltale clues of foul play.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 1996, Indiana police identified Richard Alexander as the “River Park Rapist” who assaulted four women that year. Later, DNA analysis casts doubt on his conviction.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: After the 1996 murder of Seattle residents Raquel Rivera and Jay Johnson, evidence from the couple's dog eventually ties one of the murderers to the scene.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Soon after becoming pregnant by Dr. Maynard Muntzing, firefighter Michelle Baker's health quickly deteriorates. Eventually, she raises suspicions that Muntzing is doing her harm.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In the 1980s, a trio of unsolved murders occurred in Wichita Falls, Texas. Later, a fourth murder from the same time period provided the police with far more than they realized.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: The disappearance of Philadelphia college athlete Aimee Willard is investigated after her car is found on the roadside. When her body is found, the police find unusual marks and DNA evidence that eventually lead to her killer.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: While investigating the apparent overdose suicide of Reverend Bill Guthrie's wife, detectives recover incriminating files from Bill's computer and learn of his infidelity.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: The 1987 disappearance of Houston resident Tracy Jo Shine is recalled. The investigation went cold until 2000 when a "cold case squad" learned that the woman's ex-boyfriend Michael Neal had bragged about killing her.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Doctors cannot pinpoint the source of a businessman's illness.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: After 6-year-old Michelle Lee Dorr went missing, her father confessed to murdering her. But investigators soon poked holes in his story, leaving the case unsolved for 14 years.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: The 1996 investigation into 48-year-old Martha Hansen's murder is helped by a legal requirement that bars have video cameras installed on the premises.
